name: The campfire of Hope... to finish the game
name_original: The campfire of Hope... to finish the game
description: This is my first ludum dare game. While chopping wood, make sure you burn it in your fire. Chop, and touch the fire and all your wood will be automatically burnt. However, a snowman is willingly melting himself to stop you from finishing the level... you'll see. Make sure to eliminate him! Arrow keys to move and space to chop/attack. Made with Godot Engine, PiskelApp and sfxr.
